meaningMnemonic: Time to <kanji>retreat</kanji> from the <kanji>institution</kanji>. Basically, you are leaving an institution, particularly institutions like hospitals, asylums, etc. When you are leaving one of these places, it means you are <vocabulary>to be discharged</vocabulary>.
readingMnemonic: This is a jukugo word, which usually means on'yomi readings from the kanji. If you know the readings of your kanji you'll know how to read this as well.
